Uses of Interface
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.FullScreenStrategy

  • Packages that use FullScreenStrategy 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player
    This is the main package for vlcj client applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded
    Provides the classes necessary to support the embedding of native media player video output in Swing/AWT user interface components.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.x
    Provides X-Windows-specific support for user interface components that embed native video.

    • Uses of FullScreenStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player

      Methods in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player with parameters of type FullScreenStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EmbeddedMediaPlayer MediaPlayerFactory.newEmbeddedMediaPlayer(FullScreenStrategy fullScreenStrategy)
      Create a new embedded media player.

    • Uses of FullScreenStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded that implement FullScreenStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultFullScreenStrategy
      Default implementation of a full-screen strategy that attempts to use the JDK full-screen exclusive mode support.
      Constructors in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded with parameters of type FullScreenStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultEmbeddedMediaPlayer(LibVlc libvlc, libvlc_instance_t instance, FullScreenStrategy fullScreenStrategy)
      Create a new media player.

    • Uses of FullScreenStrategy in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.x

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.x that implement FullScreenStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XFullScreenStrategy
      Implementation of a full-screen strategy that attempts to use the native X11 window manager.
